title: Google wants students in school to repair their own Chromebooks
content:
Chromebooks have become more and more popular in classrooms over the past decade, thanks to to their low costs and easy central management. description: Google announced a new initative on Thursday that aims to help schools set up their own student-run Chromebook repair programs.
